CustomField.inlineHelpText: Regex for breaking utility account numbers into capture groups for formatting. Ex: to format a POD Id as XX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-X use the regex (\d{0,2})(\d{0,4})(\d{0,4})(\d{0,4})(\d?). Delimiters are captured in the POD Id Regex Delimiter field.
CustomField.label: POD Id Regex Groups
